sentences.english: It was a tall, red brick building with windows boarded up on every side of the building.
sentences.chinese: 校舍很高，用紅磚砌成，每面窗戶都用木板封住了。

sentences.english: We appointed the school-house as place for the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我們確定校舍爲會面地點。

sentences.english: Five thousand dollars has been appropriated for the new school buildings.
sentences.chinese: 已撥款五千元爲建設新校舍之用。

sentences.english: Official Opening of the new school at Toa Payoh.
sentences.chinese: 培羣在大巴窯校址舉行新校舍落成典禮。

sentences.english: The teachers picketed outside of the school building to express their frustration over low wages.
sentences.chinese: 教師們在校舍外示威，對低工資表示不滿。

sentences.english: The country schoolhouse was three miles from my uncle's farm.
sentences.chinese: 鄉村校舍距離我叔叔的農場有三英里遠。

sentences.english: It cost much to renovate old college buildings at the University of CHANGJIANG.
sentences.chinese: 翻新長江大學的舊校舍花費很大。

sentences.english: The Association shares the office with the Chinese School and is open on Saturday morning.
sentences.chinese: 每星期六上午，在富樂頓日光坡高中校舍上課。

sentences.english: 26Japanese Self-Defense Forces cleaned the rooms at the Okawa elementary school in Ishinomaki, Miyagi prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 日本自衛隊隊員正在清理大川小學的校舍。

sentences.english: The little country schoolhouse was heated by an old-fashioned coal stove.
sentences.chinese: 小小的鄉下校舍靠著一隻老式的煤爐取暖。

sentences.english: We demolished/razed/pulled down/knocked down/toppled down/tore down/got rid of the old worn-out school houses.
sentences.chinese: 我們淘汰了已經破爛不堪的舊校舍。

sentences.english: The school master has accepted proposals to renovate the old schoolhouses.
sentences.chinese: 校長已經接受了翻新舊校舍的提議。

sentences.english: His design for the school took the second prize.
sentences.chinese: 他覃輝校舍設計獲得二等獎。

sentences.english: Some students were entombed in the ruins of the school house.
sentences.chinese: 一些學生被埋在倒塌的校舍裏。

sentences.english: Certificate of Appreciation will be presented during Grand Opening of the new building.
sentences.chinese: 將會在新校舍開幕典禮上獲得頒發證書，以示感激。

sentences.english: The school is soliciting donations to bolster its financial aid and help in its search for space.
sentences.chinese: 該校正爲財政資金和校舍擴大資金號召社會捐助。

definition: Pingfang district of Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1] in Heilongjiang
to extend (a building, an airport runway etc)
a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
lower elementary school (abbr. to 初小[chu1 xiao3])
